sense.def:
Security
so varnostni ukrepi, s katerimi želimo zavarovati neki prostor.

seg.quote: Security forces were patrolling the streets.

sense.def:
Security
je zakonsko varovanje pred možnimi nevšečnostmi ali izgubami.

seg.quote: He hasn't got security of employment.
The tenants are exploited and have no security of tenure.

sense.def:
A feeling of security
je občutek, da smo varni.

seg.quote: Children count on their parents for love and security.

sense.def:
Securities
so delnice, obveznice ali druge listine, v katere vlagamo svoj denar;
